article:
This is a 'List of countries showing past population', ranging from 1950 to 2010
in five-year periods, as estimated by the 2010 revision of the World Population
Prospects database, released in May 2011 by the United Nations Population
Division. All figures are rounded and given in 'thousands' and also include the
average annual change during the previous five years. An additional list
includes regional, subcontinental and continental subtotals making use of the UN
geoscheme.
headings: Countries and territories by population and annual change from 1950 to 1980
Countries and territories by population and annual change from 1985 to 2010
